testcase.name: Validate Date in Flight booking.
testcase.system-out: Given that I navigate to login page.........................................passed And succesfully login with valid credentials................................passed Then enter invalid date.....................................................passed And the warning message must be diplayed....................................passed

testcase.name: Validating calculation result while data is invalid.
testcase.system-out: Given that I navigate to login page.........................................passed And succesfully login with valid credentials................................passed Then enter invalid details..................................................passed And expect the total to display 'NaN'.......................................passed

testcase.name: Validate log out button.
testcase.system-out: Given that I navigate to login page.........................................passed And succesfully login with valid credentials................................passed Then locate log out button..................................................passed And click on log out button and validate it got logged out..................passed

testcase.name: Book Now button validation
testcase.system-out: Given that I navigate to login page.........................................passed And succesfully login with valid credentials................................passed Then enter valid details....................................................passed And Click the Book Now button...............................................passed

testcase.name: Remember Me validation
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to the application login URL.................................passed Then I enter empty data into form fields....................................passed Then I leave the captcha field blank........................................passed Then I click on Remember Me checkbox........................................passed Then I "accept" the popup window............................................passed And Finally Remember me error expected......................................passed

testcase.name: Captcha Validation
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to the application login URL.................................passed Then I enter valid data into form fields....................................passed Then I try copying the captcha field........................................passed And the captcha field should not get copyied................................passed

testcase.name: Password Reset
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to the application login URL.................................passed Then I click on the password reset form.....................................passed And I get to see the password reset form....................................passed Then enter the email id.....................................................passed Then enter the 'OTP' received for that mail.................................passed And finally set new password and submit.....................................passed

testcase.name: Unauthenticated users should not access the booking page.
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to the application login URL.................................passed When directly access the booking page URL...................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the login page........................passed And the booking page should not be accessible...............................passed
